sentences.en: All the family members were thrown into awestruck silence under the threat of the gunmen.
sentences.cn: 在持枪歹徒的威胁下一家人吓得一声不响.

sentences.en: Each time seeing the potbellied celebrities with high and mighty poses I would feel inexplicable awestruck.
sentences.cn: 蜷窝在一边呈失败痛苦状.

sentences.en: I am absent - minded and awestruck , ho , then ride on the wind heading west.
sentences.cn: 余惘惘而?俔兮御风而西行 ﹒.

sentences.en: I stood and gazed at him, awestruck that anyone could be so beautiful.
sentences.cn: 我站在那里凝望着他，惊叹竟有这么美的人。

sentences.en: People were awestruck by the pictures the satellite sent back to earth.
sentences.cn: 人们对人造卫星送回地球的图片叹为观止。

sentences.en: She gazed awestruck at the jewels.
sentences.cn: 她惊叹地注视着那些珠宝。

sentences.en: That was the final problem: an awestruck crew.
sentences.cn: 最后的问题就是我的被美景征服的团队.

sentences.en: The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿敬畏地凝视神奇. 缓缓地, 轻轻地, 他们都升入了空中.

sentences.en: The problem is that most people are awestruck by your fabulousness.
sentences.cn: 问题是大多数人对你只是肃然起敬.

words.tran_cn: 敬畏的；惊奇不已的（等于awestricken）

trans.tran_en: feeling great respect for the importance, difficulty, or seriousness of someone or something
